description:
Shinnosuke is Asumi`s childhood friend who ends up following her to take the astronaut course.
He likes Asumi and always looks after her but hasn`t really revealed his feelings to her. His friends refer to him by family name only.
He also responds to the nickname Fucchii (ふっちー) given to him by Kei.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Fuchuuya Shinnosuke
